Rewards Rate: 3% Cashback for UPI Spends Via super.money UPI, 1% Cashback on All Other Qualifying Spends (Maximum Cashback - ₹500 Per Statement Cycle, Total ₹6000 savings
Reward Redemption: Cashback is Credited Against Statement at a 1:1 Ratio

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver for Fuel Transactions Between ₹400 and ₹4,000. Maximum Waiver of ₹400 Each Statement Cycle

product_details: Axis Bank super.money RuPay Credit Card is a dedicated card for UPI rewards.
This is a co-branded credit card between Axis Bank and super.money, which is a Flipkart backed company.
Cardholders will earn 3% cashback on UPI spends and 1% cashback on all other non-UPI online transactions, as well as physical card spends.
A free physical card is provided.
